name: 殳國俊
objective:
本課程教授各種類高溫處理的系統與設備，並提供學習者如何應用各種高溫處理技術，如何應用於基本參數的設計已達到資源化再利用的目的。
This course is designed to provide information on the various types of thermal treatment systems and facilities.  It will provide the students with an understanding of when to apply these technologies, their basic design parameters in order to reutilization of waste materials.
schedule:
1. 熱處理概述
2. 陶瓷材料熱處理
3. 金屬熱處理
4. 熱處理對顯微組織織與機械性質的影響
materials: Physical Metallurgy Principles, Fourth Edition, Robert E. Reed-Hill
